titleStmt.title: Two funeral sermons of the use and happiness of humane bodies Preached on I Corinth. vi. 13. Now the body is not for fornication, but for the Lord, and the Lord for the body. With a brief account of the life and death of Mr. G. Lorimer, merchant; upon the occasion of whose death the second sermon was preacht. By Edward Lawrence, M.A. minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, Edward, 1623-1695.

titleStmt.title: Two funeral sermons of the use and happiness of humane bodies Preached on I Corinth. vi. 13. Now the body is not for fornication, but for the Lord, and the Lord for the body. With a brief account of the life and death of Mr. G. Lorimer, merchant; upon the occasion of whose death the second sermon was preacht. By Edward Lawrence, M.A. minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, Edward, 1623-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.R. for T. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheap-side,

notesStmt.note: "The life of Mr. Gilbert Lorimer, late merchant of London" has caption title; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams's Library.
